Title: Haggar Premium Comfort Tailored Fit Tuxedo Jacket with Peak Lapel
Description:
This tailored fit tuxedo jacket has been designed to give you the custom tailored look without a trip to the tailor. Crafted with sustainable materials consisting of 78% polyester and 22% recycled polyester. This 2 button peak lapel tuxedo jacket provides the perfectly polished look. Additional design features include side vents, 4 sleeve button, 2 front flap pockets with piped interior and mesh gussets for breathability. This tuxedo jacket is the ideal finishing touch if you adore our premium comfort dress pant!

Fiber Content: 78% Polyester, 22% Recycled Polyester

Title: Champion 6 Pair Crew Socks Mens
Description:
Designed to keep you cool and comfortable, Champion® men’s crew socks help you power through your routine. Double Dry™ technology wicks moisture so you stay cooler and drier no matter how hard you go. A cushioned footbed acts as a shock absorber so your feet are more protected during a high-impact workout. Arch support ensures a comfortable, secure fit. Crafted from a soft, polyester/spandex blend, these men’s athletic socks hug your foot and hit mid-calf. The cherry on top? All six pairs of this socks multipack feature the iconic knit-in C logo for a boost of pure Champion style.
# Pieces In Set: 6 Pair
Features: Cushioned, Cuffed, Arch Support, Stretch Fabric, Moisture Wicking, Multi-Pack
Shoe Size Range: 6-12
Fiber Content: 97% Polyester, 2% Spandex, 1% Other 5% Or Less
Fabric Description: Knit
